snippet.title: Blocksy - A fun little combo puzzle game for Playdate.
snippet.description:
Blocksy is fun little combo puzzle game for Playdate. Your goal is to add blocks to the center box as long as you can. To do that, you need to fill the box's edges horizontally or vertically, causing the blocks to disappear.

Get it here: https://luca-5.itch.io/blocks
